trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Kolkata
There were no other sightings in Kolkata on or around February 14th 2006
divs: sighting detailson the 12\02\06 morning at about 4:30 am, there was a bright light with a ring abserved and witness by many people from kohima, nagaland. the blob with a ring bluish in colour vibrating around the bright light the size of a ball a little smaller than the moon was displayed for around 10 to 15 minuits. this light was a a very suspiciuos because it look very much like a nuclear explosion in the space. i want to know whether some kind of activity was reported in the same period because the light seems very suspicious and i think it was not a ufo since the object was not tavelling.
